jobDescription: Work Location - RTP or San Jose. Job Description :Smart Account Management (Definition from Google-Smart Accounts are a new way to manage your software licenses. They provide your company with a central location where you can manage Cisco licenses across the entire organization. Smart Accounts are similar to online bank accounts.)Software licensing businessFamiliar and understanding (Cisco preferred) Licensing dataDriving business decisions when to use Smart accounts and traditional licenses for Cisco customersAdministration and analysis of the licensing data and Customers procuring licensesProgram Management and data analysis skills8-10+ years of experience
